channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Classyfrieds
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Classyfrieds

item.title: CVE-2021-24253|2024-08-03T19:28:22.247Z -- unknown -- classyfrieds
item.description: The Classyfrieds WordPress plugin through 3.8 does not properly check the uploaded file when an authenticated user adds a listing, only checking the content-type in the request. This allows any authenticated user to upload arbitrary PHP files via the Add Listing feature of the plugin, leading to RCE.
